verses.roman:
īśvara-purī gosāñi kare śrī-pāda-sevana
svahaste karena mala-mūtrādi mārjana

synonyms: īśvara-purī—Īśvara Purī; gosāñi—Gosvāmī; kare—performs; śrī-pāda-sevana—service to Mādhavendra Purī; sva-haste—with his own hand; karena—performs; mala-mūtra-ādi—stool, urine, and so on; mārjana—cleaning.
translation: Īśvara Purī, the spiritual master of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, performed service to Mādhavendra Purī, cleaning up his stool and urine with his own hand.
